text: I've been writing about the New York Times role in validating Lula's political imprisonment for years. This article contains a clear description the Lava Jato  kangaroo court procedure that was weaponized against the Brazilian Workers Party.
For more on the US role in Lava Jato, see this:

Just a correction, it is not just NYT that is omitting this fact, every single outlet in the US that reported on Lula, said that he was arrested for corruption, then released, but not one, not a single one, has mentioned Vaza-Jato or that his conviction was vacated.
We all know nyt are CIA propagandists.
Because the NYT is a willing tool of US imperialism? Always has been. The list is long but for starters:
NYT never met a war they didn’t like…pretty much says it all
Probably the same reason Biden omitted his role in legitimizing the coup in 2016.
Would it be utopian to think that Biden would order an investigation to be opened?
The New York Times prefers right wing governments in South America, and Central America, and Mexico, and everywhere.
I’m not sure why I keep paying for that rag
I've noticed that as well on a segment about BR elections in The Late Show a few weeks ago.
